channel.title: GT5 Prolouge
channel.description: For anyone who loves, or likes, cars, get a PS3 and get this game. It's absolutely amazing. If what is offered in GT5P is just the "demo" then I cannot wait to see what's coming out next year :) Graphics and realism is the best I have ever played.

item.title: GT5 Prolouge
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

They really should start improving virtual reality glasses, because the combination of a game like this and those glasses are great. Now I don’t have a ps3, but games like these make me wish I had one.

Read full topic

I went round my friends house and little jizzed over the amazing graphics.

Read full topic

item.title: GT5 Prolouge
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

PD has actually said they are working on real car damage and more dynamic car physics controls. The car physics even in the Prologue is massive improvement on the older series. They have the GT TV which sony have promised on the full version there will be 40 top gear episodes released on the complete version then more and more released over the weeks/months after the GT5 release, along with the Top gear test track as a bonus in the complete version

PD said in this interview on the day before its release that the prologue is a demo of the graphics and the cars and to ignore everything else as that will change. Like i said PLEASE ignore the lack of damage and tuning controls since these will be added in the complete version.
Pretty pathetic me defending this game but i hate it when people judge things like this on its past. PD are owned by some of the best game developers in the world and can easily make this a great game. Sure even the complete version won’t be for everyone but this is still one of the best driving simulators in the world. I hear complaints of “OMG I HAVE TO SLOW RIGHT DOWN TO TURN, STEERING IS SO HARD” yes you try driving a car that fast and you will learn that trying to turn is hard. Yes you may find controls in games like Need for speed much more fun but this is a more realistic game in terms of driving. (Forget crashing etc).

Read full topic

item.title: GT5 Prolouge

item.description:
@eVokki1 wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:2, topic:194919”]I must admit it looks amazing… but realism? Maybe in the controls but nothing else… you just bounce off walls and other cars … no realism there.

I know they couldn’t damage the cars because they are real cars but oh well.[/quote]

I heard they were debating about adding life like damage.
